meanings.sent1: Ayayas! I can't believe I won the game!
meanings.sent2: When she saw the fireworks, she exclaimed, 'Ayayas!'
meanings.sent3: Ayayas! That magic trick really caught me off guard!
meanings.sent4: The sudden plot twist in the movie left everyone saying 'Ayayas!'
meanings.sent5: The unexpected gift left her in a state of pure ayayas.

meanings.definition: A phrase used to show agreement or approval.
meanings.sent1: He nodded in ayayas when asked if he liked the idea.
meanings.sent2: The crowd's loud ayayas showed their support for the decision.
meanings.sent3: The team's victory was met with cheers and ayayas from the fans.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiastic ayayas echoed through the room, showing her approval.
meanings.sent5: The audience erupted in ayayas at the end of the performance, indicating their agreement.
